channel.title: St Anne's Religious Articles Centre | Minor Basilica of St Anne, Bukit Mertajam
channel.description: Recent content on St Anne's Religious Articles Centre | Minor Basilica of St Anne, Bukit Mertajam

item.title: Wooden Frame Landscape Pic
item.description: We ask for Saint Anne’s intercession in all things regarding motherhood and household as she is the patron saint of housekeepers and mothers.

item.title: Minor Basilica of St Anne Magnet
item.description: The Church of St. Anne was founded in 1846. The first chapel was built on top of the hill. As soon as the Catholic population begin to increase, a new church was built.

item.description: The Church of St. Anne was founded in 1846. The first chapel was built on top of the hill. As soon as the Catholic population begin to increase, a new church was built.

item.title: St Anne lead us to Jesus Prayer Book (Mandarin)
item.description: Who is St. Anne? Saint Anne is the grandmother of Jesus. Her feast day is shared with her husband Joachim on July 26.

item.title: Lam Hanging Poster
item.description: We ask for Saint Anne’s intercession in all things regarding motherhood and household as she is the patron saint of housekeepers and mothers.

item.title: T-Lite candle holder with candle
item.description: As the mother of the Blessed Virgin Mary, the mother of Jesus Christ, Saint Anne is one of the most important and powerful saints in the history of the Christianity, with equal importance to those who practice Santeria.

item.title: Holy Picture with frame
item.description: Intercessor for workers As traditional patroness of miners, St. Anne’s care for those particularly in dangerous lines of work is a natural association for us, today.

item.title: Holy Picture with frame
item.description: Intercessor for those trying to conceive If waiting in hope and fidelity to prayer can end in the world’s greatest gift to humanity – the Theotokos – then we who pray for the gift of a baby in our marriages can persevere in hope and beg her intercession.

item.title: Mother of the Mother of God: Why You Should Have a Devotion to St. Anne
item.description: July 26th is the feast of St. Anne, grandmother of Jesus and mother of the Blessed Virgin Mary. As with so many other “extra-scriptural” aspects of our faith, devotions are like beautiful decorations, comforts, touchstones in the annual cycle of the Liturgical Calendar.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: This document was last updated on July 16, 2021. 1. Acknowledgement and acceptance of terms St Anne’s Religious Articles Centre is committed to protecting your privacy.

item.title: Shipping & Return
item.description: Shipping Guidelines We ship all orders via J&T Express, therefore we must have a physical address as our courier service provider cannot ship to a PO Box.

item.title: Terms of Use
item.description: Effective Date: This Terms of Use Agreement was last updated on July 16, 2021 This Terms of Use Agreement sets forth the standards of use of the St Anne’s Religious Articles Centre’s Online Service.

item.title: St Anne Resin
item.description: Minor Basilica of St. Anne, Bukit Mertajam is a Roman Catholic church located in Bukit Mertajam, Penang, Malaysia. It is one of the parishes in the Diocese of Penang.

item.title: St Anne's Holy Water Container
item.description: For the modern Catholic, holy water is heavily freighted with meaning and exists as a symbolic reminder of three things:

item.title: Chaplet of St Anne with leaflet (Bahasa Malaysia)
item.description: Prayer Prayer for some comes as easy as thought. For others, prayer is a solemn recitation. There is no set time or place to pray.

item.title: Chaplet of St Anne with leaflet (English)
item.description: Prayer Prayer for some comes as easy as thought. For others, prayer is a solemn recitation. There is no set time or place to pray.

item.title: St Anne Oval Medal
item.description: Our Patron Saint Saint Anne, chosen by God to be the mother of Mary, His own Blessed Mother on earth, was the spouse of Saint Joachim.

item.title: St Anne Procelain Medal (Blue)
item.description: Our Patron Saint Saint Anne was born in Bethlehem and married Joachim from Nazareth in Galilee. Joachim was a shepherd given the task of supplying the temple of Jerusalem with sheep for sacrifices.

item.title: St Anne Procelain Medal (Green)
item.description: Our Patron Saint Saint Anne was born in Bethlehem and married Joachim from Nazareth in Galilee. Joachim was a shepherd given the task of supplying the temple of Jerusalem with sheep for sacrifices.

item.title: St Anne's Statue (Apple green)
item.description: The image of Saint Anne, who teaches Virgin Mary to read, suggests the feminine culture of the medieval Christian tradition, in which mothers have the mission to educate their girls.

item.title: St Anne's Statue (Brown & Pink)
item.description: Intercessor for vocations St. Anne is like the dark, fertile soil from which vows, promises, and commitments are made. Ask her to pray for you to hear God’s call to your particular vocation.

item.title: St Anne's Statue (Brown & Pink)
item.description: Intercessor for the elderly It is said that St. Anne was quite elderly by the time she and St. Joachim were blessed with a child.

item.title: St Anne's Statue (Brown & White)
item.description: The image of Saint Anne, who teaches Virgin Mary to read, suggests the feminine culture of the medieval Christian tradition, in which mothers have the mission to educate their girls.

item.title: St Anne's Statue (Green & Pink)
item.description: Intercessor for wives and mothers As a wife or mother, you can turn to St. Anne, faithful spouse of St. Joachim, for help in carrying out your duties virtuously.

item.title: St Anne's Statue (Green)
item.description: Intercessor for those without children St. Anne has a heart for the childless. Her fidelity through years of unanswered prayers for a child reminds us that God always knows, always loves, and never abandons us.

item.title: St Anne's Statue (White)
item.description: Intercessor for expectant mothers According to tradition, Sts. Anne and Joachim prayed fervently for many years for the gift of a baby before the arrival of Mary, the Immaculate Conception.

item.title: St Anne's Statue (White)
item.description: Intercessor for children and grandchildren In these fraught times, mothers and grandmothers naturally worry about the well-being of children. As with St.
